color: silver, red, purple, black, or white

long_exposure: 15 seconds max with starry sky mode

preset_modes: more  than 18 preset modes (e.g. fireworks, low light, snow)
effects: 20 artistic effect modes (big eyes, miniature, sepia, etc.)
sensor_size: 23.6mm x 15.6mm (APS-C) X-Trans CMOS II with primary color filter
ISO: up to 12800 ISO with little noise
